TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit AttachedPropertyBrowsableWhenAttributePresentAttribute extends System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableAttribute

summary.span: そのクラス定義に適用される別の特定の .NET Framework 属性も持つ要素上でのみ添付プロパティを参照できるように指定します。

span.span: Specifies that an attached property is only browsable on an element that also has another specific .NET Framework attribute applied to its class definition.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用語の意味`browsable`この説明で使用されている[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)]の指定された説明に似ています、添付プロパティの参照可能な状態のプロパティの情報に特に関連するが、[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]添付プロパティは、主にあるため、[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]概念です。The meaning of the term `browsable` as used in descriptions for this [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] is analogous to the descriptions given for , but the browsable state for an attached property is particularly relevant to property information for [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)], because an attached property is primarily a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] concept. これは、[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)]添付プロパティの定義の get アクセサーでのみ適用する必要があります。This [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] should only be applied on the get accessor of attached property definitions. これは適用されません[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)]set アクセサーにします。Do not apply this [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] to the set accessor. 設定操作の参照可能にすることは直感的に[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]関連の要素が存在して、実際の動作を制御する要素を定義するプロパティの get アクセサーの特性。Although intuitively it is the set operation that is being made browsable for [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] on relevant elements, it is the presence and characteristics of the get accessor on the property defining element that controls the true behavior. 添付プロパティの宣言の概要については、次を参照してください。[添付プロパティの概要](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/attached-properties-overview.md)です。For general information on declaring attached properties, see [Attached Properties Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/attached-properties-overview.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Type attributeType) cil managed

param.name: attributeType
param.span: が適用されているクラスで添付プロパティを参照できるように、クラスでも適用する必要がある [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] の 。

span.span: The of the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] that must also be applied on a class in order for the attached property to be browsable on the class where is applied..

summary.span: クラスの新しいインスタンスを初期化します。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

summary.span: クラスでも適用する必要がある [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)]の型を取得します。

span.span: Gets the type of the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] that must also be applied on a class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 値でのみ設定できる、`attributeType`のパラメーター、 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)]コンス トラクターです。The value can only be set through the `attributeType` parameter of the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] constructor.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance int32 GetHashCode() cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetHashCode () As Integer

summary.span: この [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] のハッシュ コードを返します。

span.span: Returns the hash code for this [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)].

returns.span: 32 ビットの符号なし整数値。

remarks.format: ## Remarks この実装は、この属性によって公開される 1 つの可能な設定可能な値に基づく複数のハッシュ値をサポートしているです。This implementation supports multiple possible hash values based on the one possible settable value exposed by this attribute, .
